scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:extension
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:extensions
scripts.typecheck: tsc --project apps/webextension/tsconfig.json --noEmit && node scripts/run-rust-cargo.mjs check --manifest-path rust/Cargo.toml
scripts.test:e2e: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(!fs.existsSync('tests/e2e/playwright.config.ts')){console.error('E2E harness missing: tests/e2e/playwright.config.ts');process.exit(2)}" && npx playwright test --config tests/e2e/playwright.config.ts
